mapper.select: SELECT SNO,STITLE,SCONTENT,SDATE,SHIT,SFILESRC FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM,N.* FROM (SELECT SNO,STITLE,SCONTENT,SDATE,SHIT,SFILESRC FROM STRAFFICNOTICE ORDER BY SNO DESC ) N) WHERE NUM < 6

SELECT SNO,STITLE,SCONTENT,SDATE,SHIT,SFILESRC FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM,N.* FROM (SELECT SNO,STITLE,SCONTENT,SDATE,SHIT,SFILESRC FROM STRAFFICNOTICE WHERE STITLE LIKE '%'||#{param3}||'%' ORDER BY SNO DESC ) N) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM sdate) AS "sdate", AVG(susage) AS "susage" FROM STRAFFICBUSAGE GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM sdate) ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM sdate)
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM joindate) AS "joindate", SUM(subscribers) AS "subscribers" FROM SUBRATE GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM joindate) ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM joindate)
